author: PACMAN
title: PacMan Staking Pool
description: We suggest you use our $OCTA staking service, for those who don't have 100,000 coins for their own node, but really wants an extra reward so the coins don't sit idle.

author: PACMAN
title: PacMan Bulletin Board
shortDescription: An interactive bulletin board from the PAC project team.
description: Now you have a chance to leave your digital footprint on our platform! No matter if you want to promote your brand or services, share quality content or just paint the wall with your favorite meme - you have the opportunity to post your images of any size right on our interactive wall. Express yourself with an interactive ad wall - a place where your message will be seen by thousands of people.

author: luckbucks
title: Lucky Bucks
description: Our platform features a diverse range of casino games, including Blackjack, Casino Hold'em, Plinko, Video Poker, Baccarat, and Roulette, with an ever-evolving list of offerings. Additionally, we host a bi-weekly lottery, distributing 50% of the pool among the winners and burning from the lottery's proceeds.

author: altcoinchain
title: Swapin.co AMM & DEX
description: Swapin.co are a simple but proven Automated Market Maker DEX, using the secure Uniswap V2 Contracts.
